Register Org

item.name: Register User

header.name: Access-Control-Allow-Credentials
header.description: Indicates whether or not the response to the request can be exposed when the credentials flag is true. When used as part of a response to a preflight request, this indicates whether or not the actual request can be made using credentials.

header.name: Access-Control-Allow-Headers
header.description: Used in response to a preflight request to indicate which HTTP headers can be used when making the actual request.

header.name: Access-Control-Allow-Methods
header.description: Specifies the method or methods allowed when accessing the resource. This is used in response to a preflight request.

header.name: Access-Control-Allow-Origin
header.description: Specifies a URI that may access the resource. For requests without credentials, the server may specify '*' as a wildcard, thereby allowing any origin to access the resource.

header.name: Access-Control-Expose-Headers
header.description: Lets a server whitelist headers that browsers are allowed to access.

header.name: Connection
header.description: Options that are desired for the connection

header.name: Content-Encoding
header.description: The type of encoding used on the data.

header.name: Content-Length
header.description: The length of the response body in octets (8-bit bytes)

header.name: Content-Type
header.description: The mime type of this content

header.name: Date
header.description: The date and time that the message was sent

header.name: ETag
header.description: An identifier for a specific version of a resource, often a message digest

header.name: Server
header.description: A name for the server

header.name: Vary
header.description: Tells downstream proxies how to match future request headers to decide whether the cached response can be used rather than requesting a fresh one from the origin server.

Edit House Unauthorized
hid condition
New House by org  hid wrong
New House by mobile  hid wrong
Edit House by org hid lose
Edit House by mobile hid lose
id condition
New House by mobile  haven't id
New House by org  haven't id
Edit House by org id instead _id
Edit House by mobile id instead _id
house_id condition

Edit House by mobile house_id lose
Edit House by org house_id greaterThan24
Edit House by org house_id lessThan6
Edit House by mobile house_id greaterThan24
Edit House by mobile house_id lessThan6
Edit House by org house_id=9
Edit House by mobile house_id=9
Edit House by mobile house_id not equal _id
Edit House by org house_id not equal _id

  "identity": {
    "type": "thailand-household-id",

  "no": "510/100",

  "tambon": "คลองหนึ่ง",

  "hid": 111
}
